channel.title: Shops dont work?
channel.description:
Hi, I'm using deltas source and when I change the skillcape ID's to the ones on silabs client from his and compile and run, nothing changes anyone know how to change items in the shops? If you do please help me.
Thanks, Moose

item.title: Shops dont work?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I have that replaced and everything, the only problem I have is when I change the items in shops and compile and run the server the items in the shops don’t change at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops dont work?
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

I don’t quite understand how clients and servers determine which item is which yet, i haven’t messed around in that area yet but you may need to edit items.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Shops dont work?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

I did, I changed the ID’s in shops.cfg thats my problem, it doesnt change when I chane it in shops.cfg…

Read full topic

item.title: Shops dont work?
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Go into the config folder and open up shops.cfg, since it doesn’t need to be compiled into .class no need for a compiler, just restart the server.

Read full topic
